body_html: @vincentvanhoucke : Suppose I am doing style transfer on phone. That will require depthwise separable convolution in place of convolution. The thing is, this involves a decoder that typically reduces number of channels from 128 to 64, then 64 to 32, then 32 to 3. In all 3 cases, you will see the number of channels being decreased. Do you believe that is a valid use case? I wanted to use separable convolution, but cannot because of this reason in style transfer.

body: @vincentvanhoucke : Suppose I am doing style transfer on phone. That will require depthwise separable convolution in place of convolution. The thing is, this involves a decoder that typically reduces number of channels from 128 to 64, then 64 to 32, then 32 to 3. In all 3 cases, you will see the number of channels being decreased. Do you believe that is a valid use case? I wanted to use separable convolution, but cannot because of this reason in style transfer.
